review: The headline sums it up. We watch more shows on this device than on cable. I've had mine since they were first released and it's still the fastest way I've found to access You-Tube, HULU Plus, Amazon Prime, etc. The relatively snappy interface makes even the latest "Smart TV" seem painfully slow by comparison. The picture and sound are noticeably better then any similar device I've tried. Some apps had a few rough edges in the beginning but most have continued to improve since the Fire's release. A recent software upgrade now lets you put it into sleep mode (nice). The voice search function works great but is limited to Amazon and a few other apps.On the downside, I've noticed more commercials sneaking into many of these apps lately - a disturbing trend but not the fault of the box so we'll not kill the messenger.
author: R. Stoer
